title: Understanding Sensory Sensitivity
text: Individuals with autism often experience differences in how they perceive sensory inputs. This can manifest as either heightened sensitivity or reduced sensitivity to sensory stimuli.

title: Examples of Sensory Sensitivity
text: Consider how someone might react to loud noises, bright lights, or certain textures. These reactions can be more intense or less noticeable for individuals with autism.

title: Identifying Sensory Issues
text: What term describes the condition where individuals have either heightened or reduced sensitivity to sensory inputs?
